channel.title: Delta help following
channel.description:
so basically I have it set up to when you kill a troll it teleports you to another island but if another player is following you then it will continue to follow them till the next island. How can I make it so they can't follow on the island.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BGGYbrM.gif[/img]

item.title: Delta help following
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

When processing follow ticks you can just compare the distance between the two players, if it’s too large then cancel it.

ps If your algorithm was written properly it shouldn’t have found a path to the other player, so you might want to write/find one which works.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta help following
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:3, topic:543580”]lol add cache reading and pathfinding algorithims

good luck[/quote]

das not what he asked lare96 :o :o

lare69:

also make it so when the played is teleported that following is cancelled…

dis better

Have a distance check in the following method to see if they are in a specified distance. To stop following altogether on the island, which is, a bad fix, you’ll need to make a check if they are in that area (island). In the following method, or packet, check if they’re in the area and stop them from following.

Read full topic
